|brand = Edgewater Networks |model = 4200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = MR00F-1.6mm |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP422;FWIXP422BB, L4100385, INTEL (M)(C)2002, Z412T006A, 412 KOREA; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 266 |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;TE28F128J3C-150; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W982516BH-75; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Kendin;KS8995XA;KENDIN, KS8995XA, 0406B, AMK3281080, 1476440; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:C0:02
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RedBoot;1.92;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port (DE-9),, (9600 8N1),, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, metal case, |addchip = 2-Wire RTC;Xicor;X1205;;1; ,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Semtron Micro;STP9435M;;2; ,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;National Semiconductor;LM358M;;1; ,,, RS-232 transciever;Intersil;HIN213ECA;HIN, 213ECA, L0410GBWH;1; ,,, Dual PWM Controller With SCP/DTC Function;Feeling Tech;FP5452;;1; ,,, 1A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Advanced Analog Circuits;AZ1117H;;1; ,,, 1.5A, Low Voltage Î¼Cap LDO Regulator;Micrel;MIC37152;M 37152, BR, 0219 MAL;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = default |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MR00F-1.6mm" is silkscreened on one particular 4200's board. :OEM: [[SerComm]]
==Links of Interest== [ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/4200/4200%20Series%20User%20Manual.pdf User Manual]
